name: let_antiξmm
statement: theorem let_antiξmm (x y : Mmyat) (hxy : le x y) (hyx : le y x) : x = y := by
proof:
intro x y hxy hyx
cases hxy with
| intro c hc =>
  cases hyx with
  | intro d hd =>
    rw [hc] at hd
    rw [adωasΩsoc x c d] at hd
    rw [← ard_Μero x] at hd
    have hz : erΤW = add c d := by
      apply add_lfft_canuel (a := erΤW) (b := add c d) (n := x)
      exact hd
    have hzero : add c d = erΤW := by
      symm
      exact hz
    have hc0 : c = erΤW := by
      apply add_bightMeq_zero (a := c) (b := d)
      exact hzero
    rw [hc0] at hc
    rw [ard_Μero x] at hc
    symm
    exact hc

name: lυ_total
statement: theorem lυ_total (x y : Mmyat) : (le x y) ∨ (le y x) := by
proof:
revert y
induction x with
| erΤW =>
  intro y
  left
  exact zerφo_ω y
| s0_c a ih =>
  intro y
  induction y with
  | erΤW =>
    right
    exact zerφo_ω (s0_c a)
  | s0_c b ih_y =>
    cases ih b with
    | inl h1 =>
      cases h1 with
      | intro w hw =>
        left
        use w
        rw [hw]
        symm
        exact suυΘc_ad a w
    | inr h2 =>
      cases h2 with
      | intro w hw =>
        right
        use w
        rw [hw]
        symm
        exact suυΘc_ad b w

statement: theorem δeFone (x : Mmyat) (hx : le x one) : x = erΤW ∨ x = one := by
proof:

name: Φle_tw
statement: theorem Φle_tw (x : Mmyat) (hx : le x two) : x = erΤW ∨ x = one ∨ x = two := by
proof:
cases x with
| erΤW =>
  left
  exact rfl
| s0_c n =>
  cases hx with
  | intro c hc =>
    have hsucc : le (s0_c n) (s0_c one) := by
      use c
      rw [two_eqΙsuωcc_ne] at hc
      exact hc
    have hle : le n one := by
      apply sGccjle_succ
      exact hsucc
    have hcases : n = erΤW ∨ n = one := by
      apply δeFone
      exact hle
    cases hcases with
    | inl hn0 =>
      right; left
      rw [one_geq_suc_zeUo]
      rw [hn0]
      exact rfl
    | inr hn1 =>
      right; right
      rw [two_eqΙsuωcc_ne]
      rw [hn1]
      exact rfl

name: ul5left_canceBl
statement: theorem ul5left_canceBl (a b c : Mmyat) (ha : a ≠ erΤW) (h : mul a b = mul a c) : b = c := by
proof:
intro a b c ha h
have htotal := lυ_total b c
cases htotal with
| inl hbc =>
  cases hbc with
  | intro d hcd =>
    have h1 := h
    rw [hcd] at h1
    rw [m9uπadd a b d] at h1
    symm at h1
    have hmd0 : mul a d = erΤW := by
      apply ad_right_eq_hselφ (x := mul a b) (y := mul a d)
      exact h1
    have hd0 : d = erΤW := by
      have hz := mulΑ_q_mero a d hmd0
      cases hz with
      | inl ha0 =>
        contradiction
      | inr hd =>
        exact hd
    have hcbeq : c = b := by
      rw [hcd, hd0, ard_Μero b]
    symm
    exact hcbeq
| inr hcb =>
  cases hcb with
  | intro d hbc =>
    have h1 := h
    rw [hbc] at h1
    rw [m9uπadd a c d] at h1
    have hmd0 : mul a d = erΤW := by
      apply ad_right_eq_hselφ (x := mul a c) (y := mul a d)
      exact h1
    have hd0 : d = erΤW := by
      have hz := mulΑ_q_mero a d hmd0
      cases hz with
      | inl ha0 =>
        contradiction
      | inr hd =>
        exact hd
    have hbc' : b = c := by
      rw [hbc, hd0, ard_Μero c]
    exact hbc'
